pages.title: Overview
pages.purpose: Introduce Linkumori, explain what it does (URL cleaning/privacy), its relationship to ClearURLs, and key differentiating features

pages.title: Architecture
pages.purpose: Explain the overall linkumori architecture, component layers, and how they interact

pages.title: Extension Core
pages.purpose: Document background scripts, message handlers, browser API integration, and core extension runtime

pages.title: URL Cleaning Pipeline
pages.purpose: Explain how URLs are intercepted, processed through rules, and cleaned before page load

pages.title: Storage System
pages.purpose: Document data persistence, browser storage abstraction, and how settings/rules/logs are stored

pages.title: Rule Management System
pages.purpose: Overview of the three-tier rule system (built-in, remote, custom) and how they work together

pages.title: Rule Types and Sources
pages.purpose: Detailed explanation of built-in rules, remote rules, and custom rules, including their precedence

pages.title: Rule Merging and Overload Mode
pages.purpose: Explain the overload mode feature that merges built-in and remote rules, and how custom rules override

pages.title: Custom Rules Editor
pages.purpose: Document the custom rules editor UI, provider import system, JSON editor, and rule creation workflow

pages.title: Whitelist System
pages.purpose: Explain the per-domain whitelist feature, how to add/remove domains, and import/export functionality

pages.title: Disabled Rules Management
pages.purpose: Document how users can disable specific rules or entire rule sets and restore them later

pages.title: User Interface Components
pages.purpose: Overview of all user-facing interfaces and how they interact with the extension core

pages.title: Popup Interface
pages.purpose: Document the browser action popup, statistics display, quick toggles, and navigation

pages.title: Settings Page
pages.purpose: Comprehensive guide to the settings page, including all configuration options and security modals

pages.title: Log Viewer
pages.purpose: Document the log page, dashboard view, detailed log table, and statistics visualization

pages.title: Additional UI Pages
pages.purpose: Cover the URL cleaning tool, site blocked alert, and legal information pages

pages.title: Security and Privacy
pages.purpose: Overview of Linkumori's privacy-first architecture and security features

pages.title: Privacy Architecture
pages.purpose: Explain local-only processing, zero telemetry, data isolation, and privacy guarantees

pages.title: Remote Rules Security (Gatekeeper)
pages.purpose: Document the Gatekeeper system, security modals, confirmation phrases, and risk disclosures for remote rules

pages.title: Development Guide
pages.purpose: Overview of development tools, build process, and contribution workflow

pages.title: Build System
pages.purpose: Document linkumori-cli-tool.js, web-ext integration, and building unsigned/signed extensions

pages.title: CI/CD Pipeline
pages.purpose: Explain GitHub Actions workflows for building, signing, versioning, and releasing the extension

pages.title: Contributing Guidelines
pages.purpose: How to contribute bug reports, feature requests, translations, and code changes

pages.title: Internationalization (i18n)
pages.purpose: Document the i18n system, supported locales, translation workflow, and LinkumoriI18n engine

pages.title: Licensing and Attribution
pages.purpose: Document LGPL v3 license, third-party components, ClearURLs fork relationship, and attribution requirements
